name: Papers + Palpitations (WIP)
description:
You've just been summoned to earth by a Graduate student, and now you're stuck. Luckily, as a demon, you know how to make good use of your time! 

A short life/dating sim built within a month for #nanoreno2018.

Features

  • Nameable protagonist
  • 2 different romanceable characters (Only Arjun and Esther's routes are finished)
  • Resource management 
  •  Minor dress up capabilities 

(For full credits check Credits.txt)

If you play, let me know what you think! If you want to leave anonymous feedback, I've created a survey: I appreciate any and all feedback!

Feel free to follow me on twitter, I'm @adoxtalks.

Update: 2018/04/01  - Fixed a sandwich related script error. Thanks for catching that, Kelanael!
